title: 親切的24H自助報到
content_en: Dear Guest, warm greetings from Ximen Garden Inn! ✨ We provide a convenient 24-hour self-check-in kiosk on the 3rd floor. Please follow these easy steps: 1. Enter your Booking ID or Name 2. Scan your ID/Passport 3. Enter your E-mail 4. Complete payment 5. Collect your key card. If you need any assistance, please dial 13 on the phone next to the kiosk – we are always here to help! Address: 3F, No. 90, Sec. 1, Zhonghua Rd, Wanhua District, Taipei City.
content_tw: 親愛的顧客您好，喜園旅館衷心歡迎您的到來！✨ 我們在 3 樓設有便利的 24 小時自助報到機。步驟非常簡單：1. 輸入訂單編號或姓名 2. 掃描證件/護照 3. 填寫電子信箱 4. 完成付款 5. 領取房卡。若操作時有任何需要幫忙的地方，請撥打機器旁的電話 13，我們會立刻為您服務！地址：台北市萬華區中華路一段90號3樓。
note: 📍 溫馨提醒：包含地址與操作指南

title: 提早入住/晚退房說明
content_en: Dear Guest, thank you for your inquiry! Our standard check-in is at 15:00 and check-out is by 12:00. If you'd like to arrive earlier or stay a bit longer, we are happy to arrange it based on room availability for a small fee of NTD 300 per hour. Please let us know your name and booking ID, and we will do our best to assist you!
content_tw: 親愛的顧客您好，感謝您的詢問！本館標準入住時間為 15:00，退房時間為 12:00。如果您有提早入住或延後退房的需求，我們非常樂意為您查詢當日房況並視情況安排，費用為每小時 NTD 300。請告知您的姓名與訂單編號，我們將盡力為您協調！
note: ⚠️ 提醒：需視房況且有額外費用

title: 行李寄放貼心服務
content_en: Dear Guest, we are happy to offer free luggage storage on your check-in and check-out dates! 🧳 Please keep your valuables with you, as we want to ensure their safety. If you need to store items for more than two days, please let our friendly staff know in advance so we can take extra care of them for you.
content_tw: 親愛的顧客您好，我們非常樂意為您提供入住及退房當日的免費行李寄放服務！🧳 為了確保您的物品安全，貴重物品建議隨身攜帶。若您需要存放超過兩天，請提前告知我們親切的櫃台同仁，以便我們為您妥善安排與照顧。
note: 🧳 貼心提醒：貴重物品隨身帶

title: 環保與禁菸規範
content_en: Dear Guest, to provide a fresh and healthy environment, Ximen Garden Inn is a 100% non-smoking hotel. 🚭 In support of environmental protection, we provide towels and hair dryers, but please kindly bring your own disposable toiletries (such as toothbrushes and razors). Thank you for joining us in caring for our planet!
content_tw: 親愛的顧客您好，為了提供每位賓客清新健康的住宿環境，本館為全館禁菸。🚭 同時為了支持環保愛地球，我們提供毛巾與吹風機，但「不提供」一次性個人備品（如牙刷、牙膏、刮鬍刀），請您記得自備。感謝您與我們一起守護地球！
note: 🚭 重要：全館禁菸且不含牙刷

title: 寵物友善入住
content_en: Dear Guest, we look forward to welcoming you and your furry friend! 🐾 A cleaning fee of NTD 500 per pet per night applies. To ensure everyone's comfort, please keep pets on a leash in public areas and avoid leaving them alone in the room. We appreciate your understanding and cooperation!
content_tw: 親愛的顧客您好，我們非常期待您與毛小孩的入住！🐾 寵物入住每晚每隻將酌收 NTD 500 的清潔費用。為了維護環境舒適，在公共區域請幫毛小孩繫上牽繩，並避免讓牠們單獨留在房內。非常感謝您的理解與配合！

title: 接機預約服務
content_en: Dear Guest, we are delighted to help arrange your airport pickup! 🚗 Standard rates: Small car (up to 4 pax) NTD 1500 / Large van (up to 8 pax) NTD 2000. For arrivals between 23:00 and 06:00, there is a night surcharge of NTD 200. To book, simply reply with your Date, Flight No., and Arrival Time. We look forward to seeing you soon!
content_tw: 親愛的顧客您好，我們很榮幸能為您安排機場接機服務！🚗 一般費率：小車 (4人) NTD 1500 / 大車 (8人) NTD 2000。深夜時段 (23:00-06:00) 需加收 NTD 200。預訂請回覆您的：日期、航班編號及抵達時間，我們將立刻為您處理！

title: 2026過年接送機
content_en: Dear Guest, for the upcoming Lunar New Year (Feb 11 - Feb 22, 2026), we have special holiday rates. 🧧 Pickup: Small NTD 1800 / Large NTD 2300. Drop-off: Small NTD 1500 / Large NTD 2000. Please let us know your flight details early so we can secure your booking during this busy season!
content_tw: 親愛的顧客您好，針對即將到來的 2026 農曆過年期間 (2/11-2/22)，我們提供特別的節慶費率。🧧 接機：小車 1800 / 大車 2300；送機：小車 1500 / 大車 2000。年節期間車輛較忙，建議您提早提供航班資訊，以便我們為您優先預約！

title: 加人/備品服務說明
content_en: Dear Guest, thank you for your request! While we cannot provide extra beds, we offer extra person options: NTD 300 (includes towel/water) or NTD 500 (includes pillow/duvet/towel/water). Extra items: Pillow NTD 100 / Duvet NTD 300. Please let us know if you need anything else to make your stay more comfortable!
content_tw: 親愛的顧客您好，感謝您的需求！雖然本館空間有限無法加床，但我們提供貼心的加人服務：NTD 300 (含毛巾/水) 或 NTD 500 (含枕頭/棉被/毛巾/水)。若需額外加領：枕頭 NTD 100、棉被 NTD 300。如有任何需要，隨時歡迎告知我們！
